Description: Sit in a calm space, away from distractions. A cozy chair or park bench works!
Take 10 slow, deep breaths. Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 6.
Ask: How do I feel right now? Name your emotions without judgment.
Write 3 things you’re grateful for and 1 thing you want to improve.
Choose a word or phrase for the day, like ‘calm’ or ‘focus,’ to guide you.
